title: We're good at stuff
headline: We can help you with that
content:
1. Create an empty array to store the result
2. Loop through the array
3. Calculate the index of the result array
4. If the index doesn't exist, create it
5. Push the current item to the result array

title: UX / UI Design
headline: It all starts with design
content: With our user-centered design approach, we'll create an online experience that is easy and enjoyable for your customers, helping you build trust and drive conversions. Don't let a poor user experience hold you back.

title: Web Application Development
headline: Develop your application
content: We specialize in developing web applications that are tailored to meet the unique needs of your business. Whether you need a custom CRM system, a project management tool, or a complex e-commerce platform, our team of skilled developers can build a web application that is secure, scalable, and easy to use. We use the latest web development technologies and frameworks to ensure that your application is fast, reliable, and future-proof.

title: Mobile Application Development
headline: Mobile apps without the headache
content: Whether you need a native iOS or Android app or a hybrid app that can run on multiple platforms, our team of skilled developers can build a mobile application that is secure, scalable, and optimized for performance.
